name: Ultra Galaxy Rumble
description:
An online free-for-all, 2-4 player, multiplayer action space battle rumble! Three unlikely beings of different origin find themselves fighting for dominance in this small section of the galaxy.

The last person standing wins, but watch out because your ship can only hover in this low gravity arena, and if you are caught without something to hold your ship up, you will fall into the empty Abyss!

Play as either Lex the Magnificent, Chadlien the Chad or Toiletotrus in this quick action knock your friends out of the ring mash up. Grab your Friends, Family, fellow Space Jammers and see who can be the ultimate galactic rumble champion.

The glorious team that has created the game
2D Artist - Hannah Feder
3D Artists - Noah Siddoway, Rebekka Staggs, Marc-Julian Galicha
Engineer - Ryan Chu

HOW TO PLAY CONTROLS

  • WASD - Move
  • SPACE - Jump
  • LEFT MOUSE BUTTON - Fire Rocket
  • RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON - Boost

This is a student made game created during the College Game Jam March 29-April 4
